product_name: Estee LauderDayWear Moisturizer Anti-Oxidant 72H-Hydration Sorbet Cream SPF 15
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingEst√©e Lauder's DayWear Moisturizer Anti-Oxidant 72H Hydration Sorbet Cream SPF 15 is an ultra lightweight and refreshing moisturizer that delivers 72-hour hydration plus powerful skin protection, with antioxidants and broad-spectrum SPF.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydra-light. Hydra-fresh. 72-hour hydration. Powerful protection.This refreshing DayWear moisturizer formula is a whipped, ultra lightweight sorbet cream that drenches skin on contact. And keeps the glow going with 72-hour hydrators, antioxidants and SPF to help defend and protect your skin.Oil-free moisturizing formula absorbs quickly with a barely-there feel.Breakthrough Technology: Water-light moisturizer meets broad-spectrum SPF and antioxidant environmental protection.72-Hour Hydration: Delivers intense long-lasting moisture benefits.Powerful Protection: A proprietary complex of 5 antioxidants plus broad-spectrum sunscreen helps defend against daily environmental damage including pollution.Skin feels refreshed, smoother, with a healthy-looking glow.Lightweight texture; lasting hydration; powerful protection.Dermatologist-tested.Non-acnegenic; won't clog pores.Item 2541047How To UseFor optimal hydration, apply DayWear Moisturizer AM and PM following your serum, as part of your daily skin care regimen.IngredientsActive: Avobenzone 2.0%, Homosalate 4.0%, Octisalate 4.5%, Octocrylene 2.0%. Inactive: Water\Aqua\Eau, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Methicone, Biosaccharide Gum - 1, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Thermus Thermophillus Ferment, Ethylbisiminomethylguaiacol Manganese Chloride, Ergothioneine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Cyclodextrin, Psidium Guajava (Guava) Fruit Extract, Fumaria Officinalis Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Caffeine, Narcissus Tazetta Bulb Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Algae Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seedcake, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Gentiana Lutea (Gentian) Root Extract, Linoleic Acid, Cholesterol, Glycyrrhetinic Acid, Saccharomyces Lysate Extract, Palmitoyl Hydroxypropyltrimonium Amylopectin/Glycerin Crosspolymer, Artemia Extract, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Fumaric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propanediol, Squalane, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Butylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance (Parfum), Disodium EDTA, Bht, Phenoxyethanol, Blue 1 (CI 42090).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For optimal hydration, apply DayWear Moisturizer AM and PM following your serum, as part of your daily skin care regimen.

reviews.headline: Repeat Purchase.  Love It!
reviews.comments: This is the first moisturizer with SPT that has not clogged my pores and filled up my wrinkles!  Love It.

reviews.headline: Feels wonderful on face but I am breaking out
reviews.comments: I usually use EL Resilient Lift moisturizer but Ulta no longer carries.  I tried this as an alternative and  It's non greasy but I am breaking out from some ingredient.

reviews.headline: A love hate relationship
reviews.comments: I wanted to LOVE this product considering the price, it feels nice, not too heavy and definitely moisturizing!! Although, it is very scent heavy, I have acne prone skin so I usually lean towards unscented products.

reviews.headline: PurpleRaye loves Est√©e Lauder  DayWear Moisturizer
reviews.comments: During my recent stop into  Ultra Beauty I restocked up on my Est√©e Lauder  DayWear Moisturizer. I appreciate the sliminess of the store/layout and the reward books that come with every purchase allowed me to save eight dollars on my most recent purchase of the DayWear they were moisturizer and eyeliner.

reviews.headline: Almost perfect
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer, and can compare it to the shiseido bio performance, but it will burn your eyes throughout the day because of the spf factor. It leaves face nice and perfectly dewy. Not oily.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love

reviews.headline: Silky and nourishing-Oil free, great under Makeup
reviews.comments: Love this Moisturizer, so lightweight yet hydrating. Has marine alge which is a plus! Love to use under makeup!

reviews.headline: Yes I would definitely buy this product again!
reviews.comments: Wish this was available in Canada! I will be buying again from Ulta!! Love this store.üòä

reviews.headline: Awesome hydration for dry skin
reviews.comments: Does not leave skin oily

reviews.headline: Does not moisturizer
reviews.comments: Worst moisturizer I've used and I've tried a lot. Have to reapply multiple times on a normal day, but I used it once when my skin was on the drier side and within 10 mins of applying my skin felt dry again.

reviews.headline: Yes definitely
reviews.comments: Great stuff, and price!y

reviews.headline: Would not buy again
reviews.comments: This product feels light and fresh on my skin, but I felt like a grease ball. I have oily skin and this amplified my oiliness. I will be returning the product and purchasing Kiehls ultra facial cream. I've been using it for years, just wanted to try something new.

reviews.headline: My 40+ skin LOVES this!!
reviews.comments: I started with the regular Day Cream and never went back.  It has a light scent, which I like, the texture is wonderful and it is refreshing when applied. I have tried many, many, many (literally) day creams from Tatcha to Olay and this is 10/10. Love the SPF (P.S. remember to reapply your sunscreen periodically and don't forget your neck and chest.) Yes, it is pricey but it will last awhile and it's worth every penny.

reviews.headline: Great at first but made me breakout and doesn't absorb
reviews.comments: I bought this product because my usual moisturizer changed their formula and it no longer worked for my skin. It was recommended to me by an employee but it just didn't work for my skin. It's a heavy smell, I broke out horribly and made my skin sticky

reviews.headline: My skin is protected!
reviews.comments:
I bought this on the 26th of sept. along with Estee Lauder advanced night repair intense reset concentrate and advanced night repair synchronized multi-recovery complex. from day one I noticed my dry patches disappear, and the sun didn't tighten my cheeks anymore. the dry high dessert wind didn't rip through it. it truly is like a shield.
 
My skin type- Dry on the verge of extreme. my skin looked like it was ashing away in the wind.

routine- After cleansing my face I paired this product with the multi- recovery every morning and my skin has yet to become dry and peeled through out the day. This works better than clinique.

*one con: it does leave a light whitish coat on my skin forcing me to really work it in. 

*a small price to pay for this product.

reviews.headline: Great for use under my foundation
reviews.comments: See above

reviews.headline: Loving this product!
reviews.comments: I went to Ulta and they had a Est√©e Lauder day where they were teaching how to do make up and skin care. I tell you! I am a convert to Est√©e Lauder. I used to use it cosmetics but it was a bit oily and this is just perfect for my dry skin! It makes my face feel dewy and my make up feels amazing on top. Very happy

reviews.headline: Great for Dry Skin
reviews.comments:
I started using it along with the Est√©e Lauder Advanced Night Repair serum, both in the am and pm. 
My face was really dry around my mouth, chin, and jawline area that you could notice it peeling/ flaking even after wearing regular (Neutrogena hydro boost gel cream) moisturizer and dewy foundation. 
The area of my face that used to be so dry is now soft and feels soo moisturized. I have seen a HUGE difference. 
I would dare to say this moisturizer is a little bit greasy, so if you have oily skin I really don't think this is for you. 
I tried it on my t-zone (I have an oily t-zone) and it just looked way too greasy, so I now apply it all over my face and neck, except for my t-zone, and I really like the look and feel it gives my face. 
Totally recommend if you're looking for a dewy feel, winter time moisturizer, or if you have dry skin. 
It's a little pricey, but if it works I'm willing to pay.

reviews.headline: Best face cream!!
reviews.comments: I noticed with in the same week a difference on my skin texture, tone and how well hydrated my skin looks

reviews.headline: Soft and Light
reviews.comments: This day cream has opened up a whole new world of soft lightweight moisturizer that sinks into your skin unlike my usual Mary Kay facial lotion that I was using prior which felt like a coating on my skin.
